name: Dan Millman
quote: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you

name: Ernest Hemingway
quote: You are so brave and quiet, I forget you are suffering.

name: Noam Shpancer, PHD
quote: Mental health is not a destination, but a process. It's about how you drive, not where you're going.

name: Alan Watts
quote: No amount of anxiety makes any difference to anything that is going happen.

name: The Buddha
quote: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path
